long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Ad Skipper
Automatically skip YouTube advertisements and enjoy uninterrupted video watching. This extension:

Detects YouTube video ads automatically
Skips skippable ads with a single click
Minimizes video ad interruptions
Works seamlessly across all YouTube videos
No configuration required

How it works:

Instantly recognizes ad types
Automatically clicks "Skip Ad" buttons
Continues video playback smoothly

Perfect for users who want to save time and enjoy continuous video streaming.

NOTE: Supports standard YouTube ad formats. Designed to improve viewing experience while respecting content creators.
